snippet.title: Voxel Works Quest - Feature Overview v0.3.0
snippet.description:
Mine and craft in 6DoF, but it's real work. A prototype for Jog-In-Place locomotion on Oculus Quest using the Godot game engine to explore an infinite procedurally generated voxel world.
You can get it on SideQuest https://sidequestvr.com/#/app/431 or at itch.io https://neospark314.itch.io/voxel-works-quest.

The video shows the features available in the 0.3.0 release.

There is now a dedicated discord server for discussions. If you want you can join via https://discord.gg/sbV2pq

Credits
The prototype was made using the Godot game engine(https://godotengine.org/), the Godot 
Oculus Quest Toolkit (https://github.com/NeoSpark314/godot_oculus_quest_toolkit) and
the Godot voxel module (https://github.com/Zylann/godot_voxel).

The textures and sound effects used are from the minetest_game (https://github.com/minetest/minetest_game) 
released under Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported (CC BY-SA 3.0) http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
